QuestData.Title: Let's Ride
QuestData.Description: Bastia will make sure that you get to where you need to go, goblin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Slinky Sharpshiv at Sky Falls on the Lost Isles.
QuestData.RewardText: $n?! Nice kitty.$B$BLook we don't have much time here. You might have noticed that the volcano is blowing?!
